Text: If you serious about wanting to get into capping,And I think you are btw,Send me a message on the forum here( just in case you don't know how to find it,Its at the bottem of ever page on this site )If you can't find me just look for who's been on today..........The reason is I want to give you an invite to Demonoid and a few others where I think you can and will get some respect for your efforts,The choice is yours,If not you will hear no more from me.
